modal.content2: Please share the link and let others know about this site.

main.content-title: Do you know about the #IamNotAVirus campaign?
main.content1: As the Korona19 spread all over the world, many people are afraid.Some people are treating all Asians as carriers and discriminating against them.These phenomena are racist behavior.
main.content2: Do not use Corona19 as an element of racism.
main.content3: Please recognize Corona 19 correctly and stop discrimination.

card1.content1: Among the corona viuses, it is a coronal virus that causes infection in humans.
card1.content2: The disease is a respiratory infection that has spread around the world since its first outbreak in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.
card1.content3: It has similar characteristics to SARS, which was popular in 2003.
card1.content4: Symptoms include fever, respiratory symptoms (coughing, difficulty breathing), and severe pneumonia.
card1.content5: At the beginning of the outbreak, it was called the Wuhan Corona and the New Coronavirus.
card1.content6: Currently, the official name 'Coronavirus infection-19' is named.

sub1.title: ì½”ë¡œë‚˜ë°”ì´ëŸ¬ìŠ¤ëŠ” ê³µê¸°ì¤‘ìœ¼ë¡œ ì „íŒŒë  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤?
sub1.content2: It is contagious when the saliva of an infected person penetrates into the mucous membrane of the respiratory system, eyes, nose and mouth.
sub1.content3: When an infected person coughs and sneezes, small droplets of saliva and bacteria are mixed with the virus and bacteria.
sub1.content4: In the case of eyes, patients' saliva, etc., can get into the eyes directly or rub their eyes with hands contaminated with the virus, which can be transmitted through the eyes.
